org.nd4j.autodiff.samediff.internal.memory.AbstractMemoryMgr

    org.nd4j.autodiff.samediff.internal.memory  

    • Uses of AbstractMemoryMgr in org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.samediff

      Subclasses of AbstractMemoryMgr in org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.samediff 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DL4JSameDiffMemoryMgr
      A SameDiff SessionMemMgr that uses DL4J workspaces for memory management.

    • Uses of AbstractMemoryMgr in org.nd4j.autodiff.samediff.internal.memory

      Subclasses of AbstractMemoryMgr in org.nd4j.autodiff.samediff.internal.memory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArrayCacheMemoryMgr
      ArrayCacheMemoryMgr reuses arrays to reduce the number of memory allocations and deallocations.
      class  ArrayCloseMemoryMgr
      A simple memory management strategy that deallocates memory as soon as it is no longer needed.
      class  CloseValidationMemoryMgr
      A SessionMemMgr that wraps an existing memory manager, to ensure that:
      - All arrays that are supposed to be closed, have been closed
      - Arrays are only passed to the close method exactly one (unless they are requested outputs)
      - Arrays that are passed to the close method were originally allocated by the session memory manager

      How to use:
      1.
      class  NoOpMemoryMgr
      A simple "no-op" memory manager that relies on JVM garbage collector for memory management.
